name: Burp'N' Shoot
description:
This game will show you the wanders of the world.

Its about a fat guy shooting things in his backyard. He uses a Colt Python Gun and drinks beer.

Be careful on what you shoot, the beer lowers your score and the boy gives you a good game over.Find the Watermelon!Get the most insane score ,don't shoot the beer, blow up the balls, televisions and ammo boxes!

This game uses sounds that do not belong to me, all rights belong to their original creators.
